PrecisReappointment of LUC JOLY, of Ste-Mélanie, Quebec, as Chairperson of the Boards of Referees for the Quebec Regional Division, and particularly for the District of Repentigny, for a term of three years, effective December 7, 1998.
Attachments
precis:
Reappointment of LUC JOLY, of Ste-Mélanie, Quebec, as Chairperson of the
Boards of Referees for the Quebec Regional Division, and particularly for
the District of Repentigny, for a term of three years, effective
December 7, 1998.
